description: Initial release of the zone-of-influence (ZOI) RBB including a detailed description of the concept based on the template introduced in Berger et al. (2023), code examples and benchmarks.
title: Zone-of-Influence (ZOI) reusable building block (RBB)
notes: If you use this software, please cite it using the metadata from this file.
